name: Blue Microphones Radius III - Mounting kit for microphone - for Yeti Pro | Dell USA
description: Radius III is a vintage-style suspension mount designed to isolate Yeti and Yeti Pro USB microphones from noise, shock and ambient vibration. Radius III features a streamlined, lightweight design, perfect for on-camera streaming. Custom designed for the Yeti and Yeti Pro microphones, Radius III is compatible with standard microphone stands and also works with virtually any microphone or mic clip that has a standard thread mount.
